name: Thief
descr:
Garrett, the Master Thief, steps out of the shadows into the City. In this treacherous place, where the Baron’s Watch spreads a rising tide of fear and oppression, his skills are the only things he can trust. Even the most cautious citizens and their best-guarded possessions are not safe from his reach. 
As an uprising emerges, Garrett finds himself entangled in growing layers of conflict. Lead by Orion, the voice of the people, the tyrannized citizens will do everything they can to claim back the City from the Baron’s grasp.  The revolution is inevitable. If Garrett doesn’t get involved, the streets will run red with blood and the City will tear itself apart.

Garrett never paid the price for anything… until now.[h2]Key Features:[/h2][list][li][b]YOU ARE GARRETT, THE MASTER THIEF[/b]
Step into the silent shoes of Garrett, a dark and lonely thief with an unrivalled set of skills. The most challenging heists, the most inaccessible loots, the best kept secrets: nothing is out of your reach.
[/li][li][b]THE CITY: YOURS FOR THE TAKING[/b]
Explore the sick and troubled City, from its shady back alleys to the heights of its rooftops.  Sneak into  rich houses, Infiltrate the best-guarded mansions and lurk in every dark corner… unnoticed and unsanctioned. 
[/li][li][b]CHOOSE YOUR APPROACH[/b]
Leverage Garrett’s arsenal to take down guards with your blackjack, shoot one of your many arrow types or use your newly acquired focus abilities to manipulate the environment and outsmart your enemies. What kind of master thief will you be?
[/li][li][b]UNPRECEDENTED IMMERSION[/b]
Become one with the world thanks to ground-breaking visual elements and a truly tactile and visceral first-person experience. Through jaw-dropping Next-Gen technical possibilities, Thief delivers unprecedented immersion through sights, sounds and artificial intelligence.[/li][/list]
detail:
名称: Thief
类型: 动作, 冒险
开发商: Eidos-Montréal, Feral Interactive (Mac)
发行商: Eidos Interactive Corp., Feral Interactive (Mac)
系列: Thief
发行日期: 2014 年 2 月 27 日
review: 最近评测: 多半好评 (55) - 过去 30 天内的 55 篇用户评测中有 76% 为好评。
全部评测: 多半好评 (16,292) - 此游戏的 16,292 篇用户评测中有 75% 为好评。
全部评测: 多半好评 (16,292 篇中的 75%) 发布至今
最近评测: 多半好评 (55 篇中的 76%) 最近
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows Vista with Platform Update for Windows Vista
处理器: High-Performance Dual Core CPU or Quad Core CPU
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: AMD Radeon 4800 series / Nvidia GTS 250
DirectX 版本: 10
存储空间: 需要 20 GB 可用空间
推荐配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7, Windows 8
处理器: AMD FX 8000 series or better / Intel Quad i7 Core CPU
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: AMD Radeon HD R9 series or better / Nvdia GTX 660 series or better
DirectX 版本: 11
存储空间: 需要 20 GB 可用空间
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。

Mac OS X
最低配置:
操作系统: macOS 10.13 or above
处理器: 1.8 GHz
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: 1GB Nvidia 650, 1GB AMD 5750, 1.5GB Intel Iris Pro or better
存储空间: 需要 30 GB 可用空间
附注事项: Pre 10.13 Users: Players using a version of OS X before 10.13 can access a compatible version of the game via the Beta tab in the game’s properties window. Select the ‘mac_support' branch for a version that is compatible with 10.9.1 up to 10.12.6.
